category: news
title: "Will General Motors and Ford Spin Off Cruise and Argo AI?"
excerpt: "Now, both Argo AI and Cruise are widely considered to be among the leaders in the race to deploy self-driving vehicles -- and both have hefty valuations. That has led some Wall Street analysts to ask whether Ford and GM might consider spinning off Argo and Cruise in order to \"unlock\" those valuations for their own shareholders."
